Abstract concept of 'wild' achieving hostile sentience
Every broken promise to indigenous peoples manifesting
Fusion of all expansion guilt into cosmic horror
Frontier as nexus for universal territorial conflicts
Living map that rewrites reality to match its design
Aspect of exploration consuming explorers eternally

low.v: Sudden downpour makes terrain slick and visibility poor
A bystander needs help but complicates negotiations
A second group arrives with conflicting goals

moderate.v: Local predator scents blood and circles the scene
Ancient ward activates, altering magic nearby
Terrain hazard splits the party briefly

high.v: Reinforcements arrive mid-encounter
A ritual begins; stopping it requires a skill challenge

deadly.v: Planar rift destabilizes the area each round
Boss has a lair action unique to this site

flavor_hooks: A local rumor ties this event to a missing caravan.
An old map marks this spot with a warning sigil.
A child’s toy lies half-buried nearby, recently dropped.
Fresh tracks suggest something larger passed through at dawn.
